Class OfficerController

java.lang.Object
control.OfficerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
OfficerApprovalController, OfficerRegistrationController
public class OfficerController extends Object implements OfficerRegistrationController, OfficerApprovalController
The OfficerController class manages officer registration for HDB projects, including registration requests, approval, and rejection. It ensures that officer assignments do not overlap across project periods. Interfaces implemented: - OfficerRegistrationController - OfficerApprovalController
